trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Lake Oswego
There were no other sightings in Lake Oswego on or around July 8th 2012
Summary: in pool swimming with friends, got on float raft on pool. Laying down, looking up and noticed this object. Watched it for 7 seconds
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a sunny warm day, no clouds in the sky. I did see an airplane and a helicopter before but it stood there and it made no sound. From were I was it looked the size of an airplane. There was a black line through the metallic pellet object I believe to be a row of windows. How it happened was kind of funny. I was in the 3 foot end of the pool trying to get on the darn raft why my friends were in the 6 foot end. I was finally on the raft when I lay down and see something in the sky. I looked at it for 7 sec before trying to get a closer look but the raft and myself started drifting away to a point were all I could see was a tree. I tried so hard to get back but it didn't work. I got of the raft and swam over myself only to find it GONE ?! I didn't tell anyone until I returned home. The sighting was random and made me ponder what the heck ! What kind of object jest floats there ?!
